programme.title: 57 Seconds

programme.title: The Conjuring

programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. programme.title: Frost/Nixon

programme.title: Armageddon Time

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". But the seemingly carefree congressman is stirred into action when socialite Joanne Herring draws his attention to the plight of the Afghan people suffering under Soviet occupation. programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: A man named Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he is jumping forward to the next year of his life. A frantic Will engages the local police and Lisa's parents in a desperate attempt to find her, but as time passes and suspicion falls on him, he must take matters into his own hands, delving into the town's criminal underbelly while running from the authorities in a race against time. programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: The Good Neighbour
programme.desc: A nightmarish evening unfolds for neighbours David and Robert when they accidentally hit a woman on her bike and flee the scene. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Thriller ║ 2023 ║ 12A

programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.desc: In a rematch of the Monte-Carlo Masters final, Stefanos Tsitsipas and Casper Ruud meet again to decide the Barcelona Open winner. Tsitsipas boasts a 10-0 record on clay this season. (21.04).

programme.title: PL Retro: Man Utd v Man City 2011
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League encounter. Here, Manchester rivals United and City meet at Old Trafford in 2011, in a game capped off by a spectacular Wayne Rooney strike.

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: With hopes of revenge, last year's runners-up Arsenal host the champions Manchester City - who lost to a triumphant Wolves last week - at the Emirates Stadium on Super Sunday. (08.10).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Held to a frustrating draw at home to Burnley last week, Brighton's next test comes at the Emirates, as Arsenal return to Premier League action following defeat away to Aston Villa. (17.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Both Villa and Fulham enter this contest on the back of Premier League losses, with the hosts falling away to Forest and the visitors suffering stoppage-time defeat against United. (12.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Villa face Luton Town in the Premier League. Celebrating a year in charge, Unai Emery has transformed the Villa Park outfit, as talk of future success under the Spaniard grows. (29.10).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Under the management of Unai Emery, Villa's impressive Premier League form continued last week, seeing off Spurs. Here, the Villa Park outfit travel to an improving Bournemouth. (03.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Rob Edwards and Luton arrive at the Vitality for a Premier League clash with Bournemouth. Cauley Woodrow's late leveller at Selhurst salvaged a point for the Hatters at the weekend. (13.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Bournemouth's Premier League campaign continues after being held to a draw at West Ham as they host Nottingham Forest at the Vitality Stadium. Forest lost to Arsenal previously. (04.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Brentford entertain Villa in the Premier League. It's 15 home league wins in a row now for Unai Emery's men, but away from home here, can Villa maintain their spectacular run? (17.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: With four wins from five, including an emphatic 3-1 win away at Old Trafford last weekend, Brighton return to the Amex where they welcome Bournemouth in the Premier League. (24.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Brighton meet Fulham at the Amex in the Premier League. Having faced Liverpool and City in their previous two, Roberto De Zerbi's men target victory over the inconsistent Cottagers. (29.10).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Brighton play host to Nottingham Forest in the Premier League. (10.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Brighton host a Sheffield United side who recorded their first Premier League win of the season over Wolves previously. The Seagulls are without a top-flight win in five. (12.11).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Burnley play host to Aston Villa at Turf Moor in the Premier League. The visitors will no doubt be brimming with confidence after putting four goals past Everton last time out. (27.08).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Aston Villa and Unai Emery arrive at Stamford Bridge for a Premier League encounter with Chelsea. The hosts are searching for consistency under new manager Mauricio Pochettino. (24.09).

programme.title: PL 30: The Invincibles
programme.desc: The crowning glory in Arsene Wenger's storied Arsenal career - the season he guided the men from Highbury to an entire season unbeaten, as the 03-04 campaign became one to remember.

programme.title: PL 30: The Special One
programme.desc: After announcing himself as 'The Special One' at the beginning of his appointment, Jose Mourinho emphatically delivered, as the Portuguese led Chelsea to their first Premier League title.

programme.title: PL 30: Rooney's Bicycle Kick
programme.desc: The career of Wayne Rooney is littered with iconic moments that defined his talent, but none more so than his Manchester Derby-winning bicycle kick, leaving Joe Hart rooted to the spot.

programme.title: PL 30: Aguero Wins City The Title
programme.desc: A moment that is etched into Premier League folklore, Sergio Aguero's iconic goal in the dying embers against QPR that won Manchester City their first Premier League title in 2012.

programme.desc: The 2018 Spanish Grand Prix at the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya. Lewis Hamilton starts on pole ahead of teammate Valtteri Bottas, with Sebastian Vettel third on the grid.

programme.title: Lando's Triumphant Return
programme.desc: Lando Norris heads back to the McLaren Technology Centre in Woking to celebrate his first ever win in F1 with the team that helped make it happen.

programme.desc: Sebastian Vettel leads the current grid of drivers on a charity run to pay tribute to Ayrton Senna, 30 years after his death at Imola.

programme.desc: The 2019 Spanish Grand Prix from the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya. Mercedes' Valtteri Bottas starts on pole ahead of teammate Lewis Hamilton, with Sebastian Vettel third on the grid.

programme.title: LC: United v Liverpool 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 25/9/13. The League Cup draw handed United a great chance to put a slow start to the season behind them, could they kick start their campaign with a win over their old rivals?

programme.title: PL: Sunderland v United 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 5/10/13. Having returned from a mid-week European trip to Donetsk, United travelled to Wearside to face Sunderland with a new name in the starting line-up.

programme.title: PL: United v Stoke City 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 26/10/13. After just one victory in four home games, the Reds welcomed Stoke to Old Trafford looking to get back to winning ways.

programme.title: LC: United v Norwich 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 29/10/13. Norwich were the visitors to Old Trafford as United were looking to make the quarter-final of the Capital One Cup.

programme.title: PL: United v West Ham 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/13. After back-to-back home defeats, the Reds were looking for some pre-Christmas cheer when they took on West Ham.

programme.title: PL: Hull v United 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 26/12/13. The Reds travelled to Humberside looking for some Christmas cheer against a Hull City side managed by ex-Red Steve Bruce.

programme.title: PL: United v Cardiff 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 28/1/14. Old Trafford would welcome heroes new and old with Juan Mata set for his debut against Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's Cardiff City.

programme.title: PL: Crystal Palace v United 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 22/2/14. The Reds had eased past newly-promoted Palace earlier this season, but under new boss Tony Pulis the Eagles would provide a tougher test at Selhurst Park.

programme.title: PL: West Brom v United 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 8/3/14. The Reds returned to the scene of last season's remarkable 5-5 draw, with three points a must following a surprise home defeat against the Baggies earlier in the campaign.

programme.title: UCL: United v Olympiacos 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 19/3/14. Two goals down from the first leg following a tough night in Greece, could the Reds complete a dramatic turnaround at Old Trafford?

programme.title: PL: West Ham v United 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 22/3/14. A long-range wonder goal from Wayne Rooney set United on the way to a 2-0 victory at Upton Park.

programme.title: PL: United v Aston Villa 13/14
programme.desc: United Archives 29/3/14. The Reds were desperate to bounce back from derby disappointment when they took on Aston Villa at Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: Newcastle v United 13/14

programme.title: U.S Open Golf Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The 124th edition of the US Open concludes at Pinehurst with the fourth day of play in North Carolina. Last year, Wyndham Clark battled his way to Major victory in Los Angeles. (16.06).

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2019
programme.desc: The official film of the 2019 US Open from the iconic Pebble Beach Golf Links. It was to be a memorable tournament on the California coast for a first-time Major winner.

programme.title: My Icon: Leon McKenzie
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, former Norwich City forward and professional boxer Leon McKenzie discusses the individuals that have inspired him during his life and career.

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Bitesize highlights as Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs return to the AFC championship game as they face the Ravens in Baltimore. (28.01).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Kholmatov v Ford
programme.desc: Uzbek phenom Otabek Kholmatov faces off against American standout Raymond Ford for the vacant WBA featherweight world title in Verona, New York. (03.03).

programme.title: Fight Night Int
programme.desc: The WBC world bridgerweight championship is on the line as Lawrence Okolie makes his long-awaited return to challenge Lukasz Rozanski at the Podpromie Arena in Rzeszow, Poland. (24.05).

programme.title: WTA Indian Wells 2024 Review
programme.desc: A review of the 2024 BNP Paribas Open, a WTA 1000 event, held in Indian Wells, California.

programme.title: How The 2010 ICC T20 WC Was Won
programme.desc: As it happened, this was the story of the 2010 ICC World Twenty20 held in the West Indies - a tournament ultimately won by England.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: PAK v IRE Hlts
programme.desc: A Group A contest from the 2024 ICC Men's T20 World Cup between Pakistan and Ireland in Lauderhill, Florida. (16.06).

programme.title: WTA Final: San Diego
